meanings.sent1: The scientists studied the guanases in the lab.
meanings.sent2: I learned about guanases in my biology class.
meanings.sent3: The guanases had a party in the petri dish.
meanings.sent4: The guanases worked together like a team of tiny workers.
meanings.sent5: The guanases were like little helpers breaking down molecules.

meanings.definition: Guanases: a group of enzymes involved in the metabolism of guanine
meanings.sent1: The guanases help break down guanine in the body.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the effects of guanases on metabolism.
meanings.sent3: The guanases threw a guanine party in the cell.
meanings.sent4: The guanases were like tiny guanine-eating machines.
meanings.sent5: The guanases worked tirelessly to process guanine efficiently.
